CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 4, 1941, pg. 4 reads: "The Kay Boys' club has just completed two busy weeks of activity, during which time holiday parties and special exhibits were features of a well-rounded program. Above are scenes from some of the programs held during Christmas week.  Left to right: Exhibit of 700 toys which were made by boys at the Kay club and distributed to needy children... - Photos by Harris"
TitMainTitle: Christmas toys made by members of Kay Boys Club, displayed on tables with Santa Claus tablecloths, in Kay Boys Club with two toned brick walls
